actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to oppression of minorities in Romania and requesting the President and appropriate committees of Congress to take this situation into consideration before again taking action on most-favored-nation tariff treatment for Romania.

summary.text: Condemns oppression of minorities in Romania. Directs the President and appropriate Congressional committees to consider this situation prior to taking action on the most-favored-nation trade status of Romania.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to oppression of minorities in Romania and requesting the President and appropriate committees of Congress to take this situation into consideration before again taking action on most-favored-nation tariff treatment for Romania.
